author: fapeeler
msg: commented out notify statement to reduce vcld.log clutter

author: fapeeler
msg: added step to refresh management node information every 2 minutes, needed to pick any changes to check_in intervals and inuse check timings

author: liyin
msg: Summary: Make sure TestDrainRegionServer is stable by waiting for all regions to settle.

author: liyin
msg: Since `ThreadPoolExecutor.getCompletedTaskCount()` is not very accurate, sometimes the task may be finished but the count is not increased because the thread has been switched.
Add a sleep before read the number.
Use `AssignmentLoadBalancer` to make the creating of table more stable.
Reviewers: manukranthk, gauravm, liyintang, rshroff, adela, elliot
